meta.label: FlowFix [WIP]
meta.description: Analyze and debug Dataiku job failures using AI. Get intelligent explanations of errors, root causes, and actionable fix recommendations.

params.name: max_log_lines
params.label: Max Log Lines to Analyze
params.description: Maximum number of log lines to process (higher values = more context but higher cost)

params.name: enable_caching
params.label: Enable Response Caching
params.description: Cache explanations for identical errors to reduce API costs

params.name: log_level
params.label: Minimum Log Level
params.description: Only process log entries at or above this level
